author: Sandeepkumar Parekh
comment: Is this really an Android app? So sluggish. Slow. Not fluid at all. seems like in app HTML brwosr is used. Even the website is slow. It took me 20 min to place an order for one pizza.  Rather than spending so much in your marketing ( getting emails everyday) ,spend some on better server infrastructure

author: Kym Moulds
comment: App will not go past the wooden background screen when opened. Totally useless since the last update. Why can't you just leave things alone when they work instead of stuffing them up. Well Pizza Huts app works OK. You've lost me Dominos.!!!!!

author: MissTurtle18
comment: App is completely useless. Won't let me go past the screen to select pick up or delivery. And that's when I finally got the app to actually load! Using a Samsung galaxy 8 and have uninstalled and reinstalled. Still nothing. Just lost business off us sorry!

author: April Davis
comment: Overall, I'm happy with the app - I can order from the menu and receive my order. However, it would be nice, if you make a mistake with the ordering store or delivery/pick up time, if the app allowed you to change those details mid order rather than having to cancel the order and start all over again. Being able to access store specific vouchers within app would be great too. Also, why present me with the option of paying $3 to guarantee 20 minute delivery then not actually make it selectable? Annoying...

author: John Li
comment: Some pizzas don't even show up on the app (eg. Chicken, bacon and avocado). Not a fan of the ordering process order, where you have to start your with location, pickup or delivery before you even get to see the menu.

author: Alyssa Kriis
comment: Need an option to add extra base sauce. I always have to call the store after i order and most of the time they are rude and tell me 'you should have done it online' but it doesnt give you the option.

author: Jeffrey Commisso
comment: Keeps crashing as soon as I open the app. Has been doing this for several months now. I have sent through feedback several times and have had no replies or solutions.

author: Barry Elderfield
comment: Stop the pop ups. I don't want 9 sides or cheese crust. Please remember card details. Add coupons deals to the front page

author: G Detering
comment: No price indicated next to each pizza. You find out at the end in final basket which is quite deceptive. Would be much nicer and respectful of your customers to indicate clearly the cost of each pizza right from the start.

author: Damien Hutchinson
comment: If you can't navigate this app you should just give up and ask your mummy to help you. You should probably just give up on life. It's really easy to use and well put together.  #killyourselfyouidiot

author: Dan Cunningham
comment: Great app but I hate it when the delivery drivers GPS doesn't come through as it helps those of us in high-rise apartment and meet them at the door. Great when the GPS works though and I'm sure it saves other customers waiting on their orders as you can meet the delivery straight away and have them on their way to next customer.
They won't let you change the store food is delivered from, so if the store closest to you doesn't accept a voucher then you're out of luck. Definitely won't be buying Domino's again!

author: Noah Peres
comment: I can never seem to get past the store select screen? It always just freezes... I'd love for the app to be fully functional though, huge potential!

author: Derek Heazlewood
comment: The most useless app I've ever had the misfortune of attempting to use. Lift your game.

author: butaned
comment: Rubbish. Won't get past delivery phase. I'd stopped using dominos a few years ago as their quality is worsening. The app has made sure I won't use rhwm again

author: Leon Hawkins
comment: I use it all the time. It has messed up and hasn't loaded a couple of times but resetting the app fixes that. Very happy with it.

author: Ciara Barnes
comment: Wasted 10mins uninstalling and trying app again but still wont go passed first page. Tried the website in my browser and just as sluggish. Aint nobody got time for that on a friday night. Pizza huts app did the trick.

author: Adam Bathgate
comment: I've been wasting time trying to get past the first screen... Domino's, you should fire your app optimisations tech-head.
What a load of rubbish. Took 3 goes to actually open it and then it wouldn't process the order. Went in store to order and got the worst service. Clueless staff!!!

author: richard samuel
comment: Why can't big companies like this make apps that work? App frequently crashes and gets stuck on opening screen.

author: A Google User
comment: After EVERY order update via notification, the invasive spam fake competition screen overlay appears. I'm NOT INTERESTED!!!

author: Pat Whittaker
comment: Won't let me select anything past the pick up/delivery screen, absolutely useless app, lost me as a customer forever

author: Assan Sam
comment: The set up and notification is really helpful. The app in itself is easy to navigate. Sometimes adds pop up twice in a row and is annoying though.

author: Matthew Lobb
comment: Did not work. Took way to long to try to add a pizza only for my session to tume out. Then went to their website only to be left unable to pay with the site reloading multiple times. No wonder they give a discount for orders online because its takes soo long.

author: sundown
comment: If I had a standard order I'm sure it would be quicker.. But it's a little slow to order using PayPal

author: Nicole Little
comment: Glitches at every single step even on login. Unbeleivably slow and impossible to use!!! Don't bother!

author: ena rca
comment: This app is useless,takes forever to get to checkout, if you can even get there. Then it won't let me finalize my order. Tapping the buttons does nothing sometimes.

author: Annalena Searby
comment: Why don't you deliver to Armstrong Creek anymore? I used to see so many dominoes cars around every day. Surely this is costing you business!

author: Matthew Atkins
comment: So far has worked really well. It can be a touch slow but other than that it's been a 5 star app.

author: Silver Tulip
comment: The app is working OK. It did get stuck on the "can we save your details?" screen and wouldn't let me place order.

author: Richard Perry
comment: The app works, but it doesn't give you an option to turn-off push notifications, which are too frequent, so I have uninstalled it.

author: Lien Ly
comment: App is sluggish and cant even put my name or email address and wont let me skip this part to place the order

author: Zak Kanafani
comment: It's more like a webpage than an app.   Doesn't run smoothly and requires a lot of loading. Please improve

author: Kris Bremner
comment: Sluggish, constant pop ups while using it.  Constant push notifications that you cannot turn off.

author: Lynette Watters
comment: Works well for ordering. Only problem I've had is with that assistant thingy. It just doesn't work

author: Tom Burrell
comment: It's sometimes ambiguous which pizza you are ordering as the select bar is closer to the text of the item below it.

author: Jimmy Tran
comment: I would like to opt out if those annoying offer notifications, but I can't find a way.

author: Ash Brient
comment: The app is easy to use, although it'd be much better if I was able to request extra pizza sauce using the app, rather than calling the store each time.  I always get extra pizza sauce on my pizza.

author: Hugo Bloodcrazz
comment: To many Ad's a bit buggy but works ok

author: Jason Dep
comment: Doesn't add items to order when you tap add to order....galaxy s6...pls fix it....otherwise been a great app :)
